title: CONSTANT disconnects and lag
body:
Since I logged in earlier tonight, I've been playing mostly doombots and then I tried 1 normal draft pick. Throughout the games, and especially during the normal, I had multiple disconnects (no less than 10 on the normal), and a LOT of lag, but my latency is fine and holds stead in the 40s. I'm on a wired connection, and while playing the last game was on discord. They could hear me while I was dc'd, so I'm fairly certain the issue isn't my net. 

Please help. Seriously. Game is almost unplayable like this. We lost the game because I got dc'd so much. I'll click to move, and nothing happens. Stuff around me continues to move, and then I'll get the 'attempting to reconnect' message. Oooor, I'll click to move, and my champ runs off in a random direction and I can't do anything about it.

replies.body: It seems to have fixed itself without me doing anything. I don't know what was going on for a few days, but I didn't change anything and haven't had a problem since.

Are you still encountering issues with this, or has it since been resolved? 

If you're still having issues, I believe that configuring your network settings to those listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) may resolve this. Should you still have issues after that, please let me know.

Bumping this; I see a rioter was posting earlier, and despite this and other threads about the same topic, none of us were addressed. Please? Either give me an idea if it's on my end, or fix your game.
After 14 hours and waiting all day, I was really hoping to get a red post in here.

Yeah, last time I played before last night was 3 days ago. It was completely fine then, no issues whatsoever. But now.. I don't know. I don't even want to play normals because it's not fair to the rest of my team if we lose because I dc and my champ walks into the enemy or just stops where it is and I reconnect to find myself back at the nexus.
happening to me, dont know what to do too :(
Hey I've been getting really bad lag since I signed in on Saturday. Last I played was Thursday though. Its like FPS lag...... But Im not sure. It feels bad but it reads 44ms ping.

8 Hours later and guess what.. yep, still happening. If anyone has any ideas that'd be great because lagging out or being dc'd and then watching your champ run right into the enemy is not fun at all, and I feel bad that this is occurring because it negatively impacts my teammates as well.
Yeah.. so, I relogged and its still happening. -.-
